description: You'll love how rich, sweet fig and smoky sage flavors complement each other in this fall cocktail. The sage shines through in an infused simple syrup, while fresh figs are muddled to achieve that trademark jammy sweetness. The drink is then finished with a splash of club soda for an effervescent touch, resulting in a wonderfully balanced cocktail.
